definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

pinyin: Hua2 tie3 lu2 huo3 che1 zhan4

definition: bullet train/Shinkansen 新幹線|新干线, Japanese high-speed train
(idiom) to have a glib tongue/to talk big

sentences.english: All eastbound trains have been cancelled due to faulty signals.
sentences.chinese: 所有向东开去的火车由于信号错误而均被取消。

sentences.english: What the little boys didn't know was that a second train was heading straight for them.
sentences.chinese: 另一列火车正朝他们驶过来，两个小男孩却浑然不知。

sentences.english: Just put me off the train at Dijon anyway.
sentences.chinese: 总之，只要让我在第戎下火车就行。

sentences.english: They started out early so that they would not miss the train.
sentences.chinese: 他们早早出发是为了不误火车。

sentences.english: It's good we checked the time of the train.
sentences.chinese: 还好，我们核查了火车时刻。

sentences.english: From which platform does the train start?
sentences.chinese: 这列火车从哪一个站台出发？

sentences.english: Ting Wen before the train, he jumped onto the platform.
sentences.chinese: 火车还没停稳，他就跳上了月台。

sentences.english: M. and arrive there two hours later.
sentences.chinese: 我们早上六点半就上火车，两小时后到达。

sentences.english: Several rum runners were arrested in the train.
sentences.chinese: 几个私酒贩子在火车上被捕了。

sentences.english: He is forced to ride in a second-class cabin because the train is unusually full.
sentences.chinese: 他被迫乘坐二等舱，因为火车是非常充分。

sentences.english: Your friend has missed the train, but his hand-bag is sti1l here. " Before Mr."
sentences.chinese: 你朋友错过了这个火车，不过他的包还在这。

sentences.english: It was because of the train accident that the bus was so crowded.
sentences.chinese: 正是由于火车发惹事故，雄共汽车才会这么多人。

sentences.english: Han Meimei usually comes by train.
The train arrived on the dot of three o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 那辆火车三点钟准时到达。

sentences.english: I had only been in one other train in my life.
sentences.chinese: 我一生中只上过另外一列火车。

sentences.english: The train conductor punched my ticket.
sentences.chinese: 火车检票员在我的车票上轧洞。

definition: power car/multiple-unit train (abbr. for 動車組|动车组)
green train (slow, noisy, unairconditioned train with forest green livery and yellow trim that ran on the Chinese railway system from the 1950s, phased out in the early 21st century)
local bus or train/slow train with many stops
(of a bus, train etc) to leave for/heading for
